description: Partial demolition, conversion and new infill development to create 141 residential units (including 37 affordable), community facility, 60 parking spaces, landscaping and associated works.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION:  Details of a sound attenuation scheme between community rooms and residential units in Block C and a further scheme for all plant rooms proposed throughout the site shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority prior to commencement of development.

The details shall include but not be limited to method of separation of community room from residential units at gallery level.  The approved scheme shall be implemented in full prior to occupation and maintained thereafter.

REASON:  To protect the amenities of the occupiers of residential accommodation.
